page.title: 03LAW AND ORDER
page.content: David Maine is a{POLICE}constable responsible for{LAW AND ORDER}in most of Sandown but his station is at Shanklin. The most serious case he has been on was a{TRAFFIC ACCIDENT} involving a girl of 13 who was killed. He would not deal with a murder case. He deals with lesser crimes such as assaults, break-ins or accidents. Once a person fell from Culver Cliffs, but P.C. Maine was not satisfied with the reasons. He is part of the Hampshire Constabulary. There are 180 police officers on The Island. There are more crimes during the Summer than the Winter because of the {HOLIDAYMAKERS.} He joined the force when he was 16 as a cadet and had to do a training course when he was 18. He passed his exams. The Island now has 14 volvo cars, 2 BMW motorcycles and 35 to 40 Honda motorcycles.
